CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Initial Review'), 'Open', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Bid/No Bid'), 'Open', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved for Tendering'), 'Open', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Quotation under compilation'), 'Open', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Tender Under Review'), 'Open', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Tender Under Approval'), 'Open', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved, Make Quotation ready for submitial'), 'Open', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Quote Ready for Submital'), 'Open', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Quote Submitted to Customer'), 'Open', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Customer Contacted for Submitted quote'), 'Open', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Quotation under clarification with Customer'), 'Open', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'PO received'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'PO Under Clarification'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'PO handed over to Contract'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'PO under Review with Contract'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'PO Approved by Contract'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Customer order acknowledged'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'PO handover to Planning'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Job handover to Operations'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Job done awaiting contracts sign-off'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Job ready for Delivery'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'job delivered'), 'Won', IF((ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Opportunity closed') && No_of_quotes_attached__c > 0 && No_of_PO_attached_del__c = 0), 'Quote Lost',IF((ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Opportunity closed') && No_of_quotes_attached__c > 0 && No_of_PO_attached_del__c > 0), 'Won',IF((ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Opportunity closed') && No_of_quotes_attached__c = 0), 'Bid Decline',IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Quote accepted but PO awaited'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Customer notified of a Completed Job'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Invoicing onhold'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Job invoiced in movex'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Partial Collected'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Fully Collected'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Invoice sent'), 'Won', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Quoted & Lost'), 'Lost', '')))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Win/Loss Tag
